name: Little Chick

name: Amulet of Betting Protection (Weapon)
description:
If you lose when gambling and have this amulet with you,
you will lose the amulet rather than the weapon.
(Can be used up to three times)

name: Amulet of Betting Protection (Equipment)
description:
If you lose when gambling and have this amulet with you,
you will lose the amulet rather than the equipment.
(Can be used up to three times)

name: Amulet for Increasing Rarity
description:
When you have this with you, the rarity level when gambling will be increased by 1.
(No failure)

name: Amulet for Improving Fixed-Level Weapons
description:
Using this item you can improve your fixed-level weapon
with the standard probability.
There is a chance of receiving the fixed level again.
Otherwise the level will be released upon successful improvement.
[Note]
If the improvement fails, the item may disappear.
(Can be used up to two times)

name: Amulet of Reinforced Equipment
description:
Using this item you can improve your fixed-level armour
with the standard probability.
There is a chance of receiving the fixed level again.
Otherwise the level will be released upon successful improvement.
[Note]
If the improvement fails, the item may disappear.
(Can be used up to two times)

name: Sellaim
description:
Fire Fairy

The longer you have this fairy by your side in combat, the stronger her elemental attack power becomes.
(against monsters +/-15 levels)
This is added to your character's elemental power.
The fairy can increase your elemental power by up to 70%.
No experience is gained for defeating NosVille monsters.

name: Blessing Amulet
description:
When you put this item on, your betting success increases by 10%. Additionally
your equipment will be protected if you fail.
Can be used for normal weapons and armour.
(Can be used up to three times)
[Note]
Champion Gear cannot be used for betting.

name: Protection Amulet
description:
When you put this item on, your equipment will be protected if you fail when betting.
Can be used for normal weapons and armour.
(Can be used up to three times)
[Note]
Champion Gear cannot be used for betting.

name: Amulet of Reinforcement
description:
Can reinforce fixed-level equipment.
It does not protect it from destruction, however. You require an extra Equipment Protection Scroll for this. Normally used for weapons and equipment.
(Can be used 3 times)

name: Pet Bead
description:
Using this item you can
place your NosMate in a bead
and store it in your inventory
or warehouse.
NosMates in beads can be
traded with other players.

[Instructions]
Select your NosMate and
double-click on the bead.

[Note]
Your NosMate's name will be lost
when you store it in this bead.
If your NosMate's level is higher than yours,
you can release it in your Miniland
but it cannot accompany you
on missions.

name: Partner Bead
description:
Using this item you can
place your partner in a bead
and store it in your inventory
or warehouse.
Partners in beads can be
traded with other players.

[Instructions]
Select your partner and
double-click on the bead.

[Note]
Your partner's name will be lost
when you store it in this bead.
If your partner's level is higher than yours,
you can release it in your Miniland
but it cannot accompany you
on missions.

name: Specialist Card Holder
description:
Used for storing a Specialist Card.
Can be traded between players.
[Instructions]
First put on the Specialist Card that you want to store.
Then double-click on the Card Holder to remove the Specialist Card and store it inside.
Double-click on the Card Holder to take the Specialist Card back out again.
[Note]
If the Specialist Card has any outstanding skill points, these need to be assigned in order to store the card successfully.
The Card Holder will disappear when you take the Specialist Card out again.

name: Pyjama Specialist Card
description:
Hey, let's just enjoy life.
What's the hurry? Relax!

name: Warrior Specialist Card
description:
Specialist Card - Fire Element

Dominate the battlefield with the might of the sword. The furious fighting style of these daring sword fighters gives even the strongest opponents second thoughts in close combat.

name: Ninja Specialist Card
description:
Specialist Card - Water Element

The eyes of these sword fighters well up with hatred. Anyone who gets in the way of these mighty warriors is liable to become acquainted with the business end of their swords.

name: Ranger Specialist Card
description:
Specialist Card - Water Element

Rangers initiate fights by firing a deadly rain of arrows on their opponents. Taking advantage of speed and the element of surprise, the enemy never sees the attack coming.

name: Assassin Specialist Card
description:
Specialist Card - Shadow Element

A fierce and bloodthirsty warrior hides behind the calm exterior of this mask. Enemies who spot him in their vicinity would do well not to take their eyes off him.

name: Red Magician Specialist Card
description:
Specialist Card - Fire Element

These magicians are the very embodiment of destruction and demise. Their destructive power has its roots in the most powerful of fire spells.

name: Holy Mage SP
description:
Specialist Card - Light Element

The guardians of light, order and balance. These wise mages act according to Erenia's divine will, using the power of good to defeat their enemies.

name: Chicken Specialist Card
description: none

name: Jajamaru Specialist Card
description:
Specialist Card - Fire Element
The return of a legend!
Jajamaru will appear in NosTale
to rescue Princess Sakura!

name: Crusader Specialist Card
description:
Specialist Card - Light Element

The iron will and belief of the Crusader ensure the balance between good and evil. Evil doesn't stand a chance against the guardians of justice.

name: Berserker Specialist Card
description:
Specialist Card - Shadow Element

Using the power of darkness these soldiers force their enemies into submission by fair means or foul! Their enemies are powerless against them and must bow to their will.

name: Destroyer Specialist Card
description:
Specialist Card - Fire Element

The Destroyer's destructive nature is the downfall of any enemies that stand in the way of their exploratory adventures. Burning with fury, he mercilessly cuts down his enemies.

name: Wild Keeper Specialist Card
description:
Specialist Card - Light Element

These warriors are well at home in the wilderness thanks to their animal instincts and knowledge of nature. With bestial rage they can overpower their enemies with ease.

name: Blue Magician Specialist Card
description:
Specialist Card - Water Element

Their frozen hearts allow Blue Magicians to turn their bodies to ice in dangerous situations, greatly increasing their resistance to the water element. They are the overlords of cold and frost.

name: Dark Gunner Specialist Card
description:
Specialist Card - Shadow Element
Dark Gunners rout their enemies with forbidden magic. These warriors derive their strength from the dark powers of the devil.

name: Seed of Power
description:
Can be used in the following situations:
1. To return to the previous location after resurrecting (10 Seeds of Power).
2. To enter Time-Space Stones (see number displayed).
3. To revive NosMates after death (5 Seeds of Power)
4. To give up a mission in a Time-Space Stone (5 Seeds of Power).

2. Upgrading Soul Gems, Cellons and crystals

name: Medal of Erenia
description:
When you use this, you will have the following for 30 days:
[Main Effect]
Adds 8 slots to your Equipment, Main and Other inventories for a total of 24 extra slots.
(Using it in combination with the Adventurer's Medal provides a total of 32 slots.)
[Additional Effect]
Increases combat and job experience earned plus the experience earned by pets and partners by 15% each.
(Use it in combination with the Adventurer's Medal increases the experience gained by 30%.)
Increases gold and reputation earned by 20%.
[Note]
Once the item expires, you may lose items from your extended inventory,
so be sure to rearrange your items in advance.

name: Adventurer's Medal
description:
When you use this, you will have the following for 30 days:
[Main Effect]
Adds 4 slots to your Equipment, Main and Other inventories for a total of 12 extra slots.
(Using it in combination with the Medal of Erenia provides a total of 32 slots.)
[Additional Effect]
Increases combat and job experience earned plus the experience earned by pets and partners by 15% each.
(Use it in combination with the Medal of Erenia increases the experience gained by 30%.)
[Note]
Once the item expires, you may lose items from your extended inventory,
so be sure to rearrange your items in advance.

name: Self-Introduction

and insert your message.
Right-click your character's portrait
to check your message.

name: Mother Cuby Seal
description:
Starts the Mother Cuby Raid on Jelly Square near Sunny Meadows.
Recommend level: 30-49
All players above level 30 can use the raid seal.
[Instructions]
Use to become the team leader.
Once you are the leader, click other characters
and click the 'Team' button. When ready, head to the raid entrance.
When the leader enters the raid,
all other members will follow automatically.
[Note]
Characters higher than the recommended level may enter the raid, but will receive a penalty.
(No additional hearts and no raid box, even upon victory)

name: Ginseng Seal
description:

name: Soulstone Blessing
description:
When you transform into a specialist,
you will earn 50% more job level experience.
(Effect lasts for one hour)

name: Lower SP Protection Scroll
effects: Self >> Use Lower SP Protection Scroll.
description:
Use this item to upgrade your Specialist Card of level 0-9. Even if you fail, the card's soul will not be destroyed nor will your Shining Red Soul and Shining Green Soul be lost.

[Instructions]
Double-click the item to open the card upgrade window. Your Specialist Card will be protected from failure by the scroll.

name: Higher SP Protection Scroll
effects: Self >> Use Higher SP Protection Scroll.
description:
You can use the Protection Scroll when upgrading a Specialist Card of level 10-14. Even if the upgrade fails, you won't lose the Shining Blue Soul!
[Instructions]
The protection begins as soon as you double-click on the scroll.
Double-click the scroll again to cancel the effect.
(In this case no Protection Scroll will be consumed.)
You only consume an SP Protection Scroll any time you upgrade a Specialist Card with the active protection effect.

name: Soul Revival Stone
description:
It brings new life to the destroyed Specialist Card. Double-click the scroll to instantly restore the destroyed soul.
Also increases basic SP by 10,000.

name: Point Initialisation Potion
description: Restores all used skill points so that you can redistribute them.

name: Christmas Stocking
description:
This is a pretty Christmas stocking.
Bring 5 of these stockings to Santa and he will exchange them for a gift.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Falling Star
description:
Santa is looking for this Falling Star.
If you take 10 Jingle Bells and 10 Falling Stars to him,
he'll give you a Christmas Gift Box
When you have collected 20 of them, you can get Teoman Topp to produce a bell for you.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Jingle Bell
description:
Slugg needs these beautiful Jingle Bells to decorate the tree.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Winter Event Gift Box
description:
What could be inside this box?
Double-click it to find out!
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Snowman Raid Seal
description:
Create the Snowman Raid with this raid seal.
Head to the Snowy Trail, west of NosVille.
Recommended level: 20-99
[Instructions]
Use to become the team leader.
Once you are the leader, click other characters
and click the 'Team' button. When ready, head to the raid entrance.
When the leader enters the raid,
all other members will follow automatically.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Anni's Letter
description:
I don't have enough money to pay my living expenses because I opened a savings account where I automatically deposit a certain amount of money every month.
Please give me a raise.
Anni

Your old friend, Anni

name: Perfume
description:
Items bound exclusively to another player can be unbound with this item.
Simply double-click and the item will be transformed so you can use it.
The number of bottles of perfume required to successfully transform an item depends on its level and rarity.

name: Rainbow Pearl
description:
A pearl for identifying items.
Grind the pearl down and sprinkle the powder on an item to discover its hidden options.

name: Magic Eraser
description:
An eraser which can remove all options from an item.
[Caution]
1. Erased options cannot be recovered.
2. Bound items remain bound even after its options have been erased.

name: Angel Base Flag
description:
Your base camp will be under construction for 30 minutes.
You can teleport to your base camp once it is complete.
Can only be used in Glacernon.
Only one base camp is permitted per faction.

name: Demon Base Flag
description:
Your base camp will be under construction for 30 minutes.
You can teleport to your base camp once it is complete.
Can only be used in Glacernon.
Only one base camp is permitted per faction.

name: Bag Package (30 Days)
description:
A bag set that extends your inventory.
Use it to receive an Extra Large Warehouse (30 Days), a Partner's Backpack (30 Days), an Adventurer's Knapsack (30 Days) and a Pet Basket (30 Days).

name: Bag Package (10 Days)
description:
A bag set that extends your inventory.
Use it to receive a Partner's Backpack (10 Days), an Adventurer's Knapsack (10 Days) and a Pet Basket (10 Days).

name: Blessing Package (10 Units)
description:
You can increase your experience with this Blessing Package.
Use it to receive 10x Ancelloan's Blessing and 10x Guardian Angel's Blessing.

name: Blessing Package (5 Units)
description:
You can increase your experience with this Blessing Package.
Use it to receive 5x Ancelloan's Blessing and 5x Guardian Angel's Blessing.

name: PvP Attack Capsule
description:
Increases PvP attack power for an hour.
Only applies while the player is in Glacernon.

name: PvP Defence Capsule
description:
Increases PvP defence for an hour.
Only applies while the player is in Glacernon.

name: PvP Resistance Capsule
description:
Increases PvP resistance for an hour.
Only applies while the player is in Glacernon.

name: Family Summoning Horn
description:
Can summon family members to the location where it is used.
A banner will appear in the right corner.
Only applies to family members who are in the same channel. Cannot be used in raids or Time-Spaces.

name: Angel Sanctum Construction Kit
description:
Build the sanctum that resurrects the white seals in the angel camp for one hour.
It restores 100% HP and MP and makes them invincible in PvP for 5 seconds.
For each resurrected player, or if the enemy attacks the sanctum, the duration is reduced. The building disappears once the time has expired.
Can only be used by angel camp players in Glacernon.

name: Devil Altar Construction Kit
description:
Build the altar that resurrects the white seals in the demon camp for one hour.
It restores 100% HP and MP and makes them invincible in PvP for 5 seconds.
For each resurrected player, or if the enemy attacks the altar, the duration is reduced. The building disappears once the time has expired.
Can only be used by demon camp players in Glacernon.

name: Angel Wings
description:
Transforms your specialist's wings into Angel Wings.
[Instructions]
1. Transform into a specialist.
2. Use this item to change your wings.
[Note]

2. The effect disappears when you put your Specialist Card in a card holder.

description:

2. The effect disappears when you put your Specialist Card in a card holder.

name: Robber Gang's Blueprints
description:
A sketch describing the construction of the Desert Robbers' mask.
It explains how you can build new weapons or armour.
[Production]
1. All materials must be present in your inventory.
2. Double-click on the scroll to open the production window.
3. Select the item you wish to craft.
4. Drag the necessary equipment items into the window.
5. Click on 'Produce' to complete the process.
[Note]
The rarity, grade and any options of the starting items will be transferred to the crafted item.

name: Robber Gang Seal
description:
Starts the Robber Gang raid on the Secret Path near the Robber Centre.
Recommended level: 80-99
All players above level 80 can use the raid seal.
[Instructions]
Use to become the team leader.
Once you are the leader, click other characters
and click the 'Team' button. When ready, head to the raid entrance.
When the leader enters the raid,
all other members will follow automatically.
[Note]
Characters higher than the recommended level may enter the raid, but will receive a penalty.
(No additional hearts and no raid box, even upon victory)

description:
A set of five tarot cards.
You will receive five of the following sealed cards:
Fool, The Magician, The Lovers, The Hermit, Death, The Devil, The Tower, The Star, The Moon or The Sun.
Upon using a sealed tarot card you will receive a Tarot card as an equipment item. Duration starts as soon as you use it.
There is no level requirement for this item.

name: Halloween Costume Scroll
description:
Use the Halloween Costume Scroll to transform into an evil monster. If the transformation is successful, a scroll will be consumed.
You can transform into the following monsters:
Yak Warrior
Princess Catrisha
Pinching Torturer
Wheel Torturer
Iron Torturer
Death Warrior
Dust King
Darkwitch
Bloodwitch
Whitewitch
Transforming back:
Click on the scroll again when you are transformed and you will transform back. This will not consume the costume scroll.
If you die or log out, you will automatically transform back.

name: Book of Halloween Transformation
description:
Transform into a monster for Halloween with this item. If the transformation is successful, a scroll will be consumed.
You can transform into the following monsters:
Yak Warrior
Princess Catrisha
Pinching Torturer
Wheel Torturer
Iron Torturer
Transforming back:
Click on the scroll again when you are transformed and you will transform back. This will not consume another scroll.
If you die or log out, you will automatically transform back.

name: Halloween Costume Scroll (Event)
description:
Use the Halloween Costume Scroll to transform into an evil monster. If the transformation is successful, a scroll will be consumed.
You can transform into the following monsters:
Yak Warrior

Transforming back:

Event item.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Jack O'Lantern's Seal
description:
You can enter the Halloween raid via Jack's Hideout in the north-west of NosVille.
Recommended level: 20-99
[Instructions]
Use to become the team leader.
As leader you can invite other members by clicking the 'Team' button.
When the leader enters the raid, all other members will follow automatically.
[Note]
Characters higher than the recommended level may enter the raid, but will receive a penalty.
(No additional hearts and no raid box, even upon victory)
Event item.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Bag of Sweets (Event)
description:
You can get a Bag of Sweets after a Trick or Treat quest.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Halloween Signpost
description:
Set up this signpost so that other players can visit your Miniland for 30 minutes.
The signpost looks like Jack O'Lantern.

name: Halloween Horror Box
description:
Halloween Horror Box
You will receive one of the following items:
1x Pumpkin Hat (Permanent)
1x Pumpkin Bushtail
1x Scary Pet Trainer (Event)
1x Pumpkin Hat (30 Days)
1x Pumpkin Hat (7 Days)
1x Pet Basket (Event, 10 Days)
1x Adventurer's Knapsack (Event, 10 Days)

1x Soulstone Blessing (Event)
1x Ancelloan's Blessing (Event)
1x Guardian Angel's Blessing (Event)
1x NosMerchant Medal (1 Day, Event)
1x Fairy Booster (Event)
10x Movement Scroll (Event)
30x Huge Recovery Potion (Event)
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Sealed Vessel
description:
A sealed vessel that contains captured monsters.

Open it to release monsters in the village, out in the open or in your Miniland. You can earn lots of experience hunting these monsters, plus you have a chance to get some sealed chests.

[Note]

Monsters created in the Miniland disappear as soon as the Miniland is empty or its owner logs out.

Event item.

[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Sealed Vessel (Event)
description:
A sealed vessel that contains captured monsters.

Open it to release monsters in the village, out in the open or in your Miniland. You can earn lots of experience hunting these monsters, plus you have a chance to get some sealed chests.

[Note]

Monsters created in the Miniland disappear as soon as the Miniland is empty or its owner logs out.

Event item.

[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: zts4918e
description:
Use this key to get different rewards.
Which reward you get is all down to destiny!

name: Cupid's Arrow
description:
Cupid's Arrow brings couples together.
[Instructions]
Choose a character who you would like to marry.
[Effect]
When you go hunting for monsters with your spouse as a group, you will earn 5% more experience.
You also don't require any Wings of Friendship to get to your spouse.
[Note]
The item will be consumed regardless of the outcome of your proposal.

name: Separation Letter
description:
You can separate from your spouse with this item.
[Instructions]
It is sufficient for one person to use the item for a separation.

name: Single Fireworks
description:
A firework that only goes off once.
Use it to stage a light show.

name: Double Fireworks
description:
A firework that sets off rockets non-stop.
Use it to stage a fantastic one-of-a-kind spectacle.

name: Fountain Firework (Blue)
description:
A fountain of blue sparks.
Light this firework and marvel at the pretty display!

name: Fountain Firework (Yellow)
description:
A fountain of yellow sparks.
Light this firework and marvel at the pretty display!

name: Heart Firework (Blue)
description:
A fountain which creates the shape of a heart with blue sparks.
Light this firework and marvel at the pretty display!

name: Heart Firework (Red)
description:
A fountain which creates the shape of a heart with red sparks.
Light this firework and marvel at the pretty display!

10x Heart Firework (Red)
[Note]

Can whisk you to your friend in the blink of an eye.
[Instructions]
Open your friends list.
Click the 'Go' icon.
You travel straight to your friend
consuming one pair of wings.

name: Super Hair Gel
description:
Changes the look of your hair.
Cannot be used by adventurers.

name: Super Hair Wax
description:
Changes the look of your hair.
Cannot be used by adventurers.

name: Pink Hair Dye
description: Dyes hair pink.

description: Dyes hair light green.

name: Black Hair Dye

name: Potion of Dignity
description: Increases dignity to the maximum.

name: NosMall Cake
description:
Temporarily increases HP and MP.
Heals NosMates and partners.
A special item to celebrate the NosMall launch!

name: Team Stone
description:
Brings members of a group to the leader's location.

Note:
This item can only be used by the team leader at the start of a raid map.

name: Handkerchief of Separation
description:
Returns the selected partner to the wild.
Once released, this cannot be undone.

name: Slade's Claw
description: A claw from the ancient demon Slade which was in the Catsies' possession.

name: Speaker
description:
Send your own message
to all players in the channel.

[Instructions]
Double-click the speaker
and enter your message.

name: Speech Bubble
description:
You can use the Speech Bubble for 30 minutes.
The bubble disappears when leaving the game.
Once entered the message cannot be altered.
Removing the bubble prematurely is not possible.

name: Hot Chocolate
description:

name: Noodle Soup
description:

If your NosMate is within three fields, theirs will also be restored.
Can be used while resting.

activated on NosMates accompanying you.
Placing your pet in a bead
will cancel this option.

name: Raid Certificate
description:
You can get this Raid Certificate by helping a raid team.
You can also sell it in the shop.
On successfully completing the raid, all raid helpers will receive a certificate as long as three players were of the recommended level.
[Raids]
Mother Cuby
Ginseng
Dark Castra
Giant Black Spider
Massive Slade
[Limitation]
You can only receive one reward for each raid per day.

name: Pirate Pet Trainer (Event)
effects: Self >> Summons 1 of [ Pirate Pet Trainer] monsters. (Training dummy)
description:
Activate the pet trainer to train your NosMate's attack and defence power.
It takes some serious training to be prepared for lift at sea.
When your NosMate attacks the pet trainer, its attack power has a certain chance of increasing.
When your NosMate receives damage from the pet trainer, its defence power has a certain chance of increasing.
Also, even if your NosMate suffers damage from the pet trainer, its attack and defence power will not be reset.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Yellow Pumpkin Sweet (Event)
description:
A tasty pumpkin sweet.
It regenerates HP and MP.
This also applies to your NosMate.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Scary Pet Trainer (Event)
effects: Self >> Summons 1 of [ Scary Pet Trainer] monsters. (Training dummy)
description:
Activate the Scary Pet Trainer to train your NosMate's attack and defence power.
Your NosMate will need to go through a rigorous training regime to defeat the evil Jack O'Lantern.
When your NosMate attacks the pet trainer, its attack power has a certain chance of increasing.
When your NosMate receives damage from the pet trainer, its defence power has a certain chance of increasing.
Also, even if your NosMate suffers damage from the pet trainer, its attack and defence power will not be reset.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Black Pumpkin Sweet (Event)
effects: Self >> You receive an additional 800 HP. (Cannot exceed 40% of your maximum HP.)
description:
A sour pumpkin sweet.
It increases maximum HP by 40%.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Strange Pet Food
description:
Put your pet on a special diet with this food.
If you give your NosMate some of this, its level will drop by one.
This is especially useful if your NosMate has a higher level than your character.
[Note]
Cannot be used on NosMates at level 1.

name: Chocolate Cake
effects: Self >> You receive an additional 800 HP. (Cannot exceed 40% of your maximum HP.)
description:
A delicious chocolate cake.
The cake provides you with an additional 800 HP.
You cannot replenish more than 40% of your total HP.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Fresh Cream Cake
description:
A cream cake for Christmas.
Slowly restores HP and MP
Also applies to your NosMate.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Rudolph's Pet Trainer
effects: Self >> Summons 1 of [ Rudolph's Pet Trainer] monsters. (Training dummy)
description:
Activate Rudolph's Pet Trainer to train your NosMate's attack and defence power.
It takes some serious training to be prepared for when the Arctic storms arrive.
When your NosMate attacks the pet trainer, its attack power has a certain chance of increasing.
When your NosMate receives damage from the pet trainer, its defence power has a certain chance of increasing.
Also, even if your NosMate suffers damage from the pet trainer, its attack and defence power will not be reset.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Partner's Guardian Angel
description:
Resurrect your partner with this Guardian Angel.
Restores 50% of your partner's HP.

You can only use it in the desert.
Within the desert region you can return to a village with a respawn point.

name: Golden New Year's Carrot (Event)
description:
An event item.
A carrot made of gold.
If you sell this in a shop, you'll receive 10,000 gold.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Fresh Carrot Juice (Event)
description:
An event meal.
Temporarily increases HP and MP.
Heals NosMates and partners.
Can only be used while resting.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Tasty Carrot Snack (Event)
description:
An event snack.
Temporarily increases HP and MP.
Heals NosMates and partners.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Evolution Fruit (Event)
description:
This is an Evolution Fruit.
Feed it to your pet to allow it to evolve.
If you're successful, its attack and defence levels will be reset.
If the evolution fails, the pet will become unsettled. Its loyalty will drop below zero and it will neither follow you, nor will you be able to feed it or use the Evolution Fruit.
[Note]
You can only use the fruit in the Miniland.
You cannot use it on pets that are already following you.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Chocolate Rabbit (Event)
description:
Chocolate in the shape of a bunny!
Looks delicious!
Slowly restores HP and MP.
Also applies to your NosMate.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Mysterious Hair Dye
description:
This hair dye is truly mysterious.
It changes your current hair colour to another random colour.
Try it out to find out what you get. Go on, we dare you!

name: NosMate Summoning Book
description:
This book summons a NosMate from your Miniland.
[Instructions]
If you select a pet or a partner and then use this item, a new NosMate symbol appears next to the character information.
[Note]
You cannot summon a NosMate who is already accompanying you.

name: Summoning Horn
description:
Quest item.
The Summoning Horn produces sounds that sound like
the melody of an ancient Viking song.

name: Strange Partner Food
description:
Put your partner on a special diet with this food.
If you give your partner some of this, their level will drop by one.
This is especially useful if your partner has a higher level than your character.
[Note]
Cannot be used on partners at level 1.

name: Delicious Watermelon
description:
The Delicious Watermelon regenerates HP and MP.
This also applies to your NosMate if they are within 3 fields.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Bean Rice Cake
description:
Slowly restores 5,000 HP and MP.
Also applies to your NosMate.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Cure
description:
Slowly restores 5,000 HP and MP.
Also applies to your NosMate.
[Note]

name: Ginseng Leaf
description:
Boosts your stamina.
The Dragon King is looking for it.
HP: 5,000, MP: 5,000
Also applies to your NosMate.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Carrot
description:
Bunnies love carrots.
They're good for your health...
...and for kids!
HP: 500, MP: 500
Also applies to your NosMate.

name: Zenas' Egg
description:
The egg contains the fairy Zenas.
The light is shaped like an egg.

name: Glorious Multicoloured Acorn
description:
A colourful acorn.
Eating it could be dangerous...

name: Erenia's Egg
description:
The egg contains the fairy Erenia.
The shadows are shaped like an egg.

name: Fernon's Ei
description:
The egg contains the fairy Fernon.
Light and shadow are fused into the shape of this egg.

name: Holy Water of the Order
description:
The holy water from Felice, clean and fresh.
A mysterious power dwells within.
Use it to release hidden energy.

name: Twilight Essence
description:
The essence of twilight.
Contains the energy of a witch.

name: Abyssal Essence
description:
The echo of a crying soul is bound within this essence.
Contains the energy of Caligor.

name: Sellaim's Essence
description: The fire essence in which the energy of Sellaim smoulders.

name: Woondine's Essence
description: The water essence through which the energy of Woondine flows.

name: Eperial's Essence
description: The light essence from which the energy of Eperial shines.

name: Turik's Essence
description: The shadow essence in which the energy of Turik dwells.

name: Elkaim's Essence
description: The fire essence in which the energy of Elkaim smoulders.

name: Ladine's Essence
description: The water essence through which the energy of Ladine flows.

name: Rumial's Essence
description: The light essence from which the energy of Rumial shines.

name: Varik's Essence
description: The shadow essence in which the energy of Varik dwells.

name: Fairy King's Essence
description:
The first fairy and thus the king of all fairies.
The first essence containing the energy of the Fairy King.
If used by a non-fairy, the energy within will destroy them.

name: Frost Crystal
description: Contains the concentrated ice energy of the Bitoren Tundra.

name: Fragment of the Fernon Tree
description:
A fragment of the Fernon tree.
Contains magical powers.

name: Sealant
description:
Created specifically for the task of sealing in the energy of Fernon.
It is strong enough to endure the power of a god.

name: Coolant
description: A liquid used for cooling engines.

name: Pure Mithril
description:
100% pure mithril.
Used to amplify holy energy.

name: Adamantium
description: The toughest material in the world.

name: Ertel
description:
Formed naturally by the accumulation of mana in the atmosphere.
It has a very high purity.
Increases the user's mana and mana regeneration.

name: Fernon's Energy
description:
Born of darkness and despair.
It contains both light and shadow.

name: Fernon's Essence
description: An essence harvested from Fernon's energy.

name: Bloodstained Bandage
description: A bandage covered in blood stains.

name: Uncomfortable Clothing
description: Tight and restrictive clothing.

name: Lingering Malice
description: A lump of pure, undiluted hatred.

name: Shining Dowsing Rod
description:
The rod will prove useful at a secret location.
[Usage]
1. Move to the location where the safe zone is hidden.
2. Use the Dowsing Rod.
3. If a question mark appears, move around and try again from a different location.
4. If an arrow appears, move in the direction the arrow is pointing and use the Dowsing Rod again.

name: Ancient Dowsing Rod
description:
Head to a secret location.
[Usage]
The rod will find a location which is safe from Fafnir's breath.

[Instructions]
1. Move to the location where the safe zone is hidden.
2. Use the Dowsing Rod.
3. If a question mark appears, move around and try again from a different location.
4. If an arrow appears, move in the direction the arrow is pointing and use the Dowsing Rod again.

name: Grenigas Weapons Parchment
description:
This parchment describes how you can craft weapons with Grenigas' power.
It includes the formula for creating a new weapon.
Bring the required materials and this parchment to Elias the Smith.
You can find him in Desert Eagle City and in Mortaz Desert Harbour.
He will help you to produce this powerful weapon.

name: Grenigas Secondary Weapons Parchment
description:
This parchment describes how you can craft secondary weapons with Grenigas' power.
It includes the formula for creating a new secondary weapon.
Bring the required materials and this parchment to Elias the Smith.
You can find him in Desert Eagle City and in Mortaz Desert Harbour.
He will help you to produce this indispensable secondary weapon.

name: Grenigas Armour Parchment
description:
This parchment describes how you can craft armour with Grenigas' power.
It includes the formula for creating a new piece of armour.
Bring the required materials and this parchment to Elias the Smith.
You can find him in Desert Eagle City and in Mortaz Desert Harbour.
He will help you to produce this sturdy armour.

name: Earth Element
description:
An element containing the energy of the earth.
Once you have gathered 5 Earth Elements, you will receive Spring Water for them.
Used for producing items.

name: Spring Water
description:
This water contains the energy of the earth within it.
Once you have gathered 5 lots of Spring Water, you will receive an Earth Crystal.
Used for producing items.

name: Earth Crystal
description:
A crystal containing the energy of the earth.
Used for producing items

name: Blazing Piece of Red Metal
description: Used for producing items.

name: Ancient Civilisation Tablet
description: Used for producing items.

name: Kertos' Pattern
description: Used for producing items.

name: Katol's Pattern
description: Used for producing items.

name: Grail's Pattern
description: Used for producing items.

name: Dragon Skin
description:
Dragon Skin is an important material for upgrading high-ranking Specialist Cards.
This item is used for the upgrade from level 0-4.

name: Dragon Blood
description:
Dragon Blood is an important material for upgrading the high-ranking Specialist Cards.
This item is used for the upgrade from level 5-9.

name: Dragon Heart
description:
The Dragon Heart is an important material for upgrading the high-ranking Specialist Cards.
This item is used for the upgrade from level 10-14.

name: Small Ruby of Completion
description:
This priceless jewel improves your low-level Specialist Card.
Use it to bring your fire element cards closer to perfection.

name: Small Sapphire of Completion
description:
This priceless jewel improves your low-level Specialist Card.
Use it to bring your water element cards closer to perfection.

name: Small Obsidian of Completion
description:
This priceless jewel improves your low-level Specialist Card.
Use it to bring your shadow element cards closer to perfection.

name: Small Topaz of Completion
description:
This priceless jewel improves your low-level Specialist Card.
Use it to bring your light element cards closer to perfection.

name: Ruby of Completion
description:
This precious jewel improves your high-level Specialist Card.
Use it to bring your fire element cards closer to perfection.

name: Sapphire of Completion
description:
This precious jewel improves your high-level Specialist Card.
Use it to bring your water element cards closer to perfection.

name: Obsidian of Completion
description:
This precious jewel improves your high-level Specialist Card.
Use it to bring your shadow element cards closer to perfection.

name: Topaz of Completion
description:
This precious jewel improves your high-level Specialist Card.
Use it to bring your light element cards closer to perfection.

name: Draco's Claw
description:
You can steal the Draco's Claw from the fire dragon in the raid.
You can trade 50 Draco's Claws for a Gladiator, Fire Cannoneer or Volcano Specialist Card from the Great Magician Kan.
For 5 Draco Claws you'll receive a Ruby of Completion.

name: Glacerus' Mane
description:
You have stolen parts of Glacerus' Mane from the ice cold beast in the raid.
You can trade 50 lots of Glacerus' Mane for a Battle Monk, Scout or Tide Lord Specialist Card from Felix Frost.
For 5 lots of Glacerus' Mane you'll receive a Sapphire of Completion.

name: Bean Flour Cake
description:
This tasty treat distracts the Millennial Tiger.
Give it to the tiger when it is blocking your way.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Bolt (Event)
description:
A sturdy bolt with a special thread.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Nut (Event)
description:
A nut which fits the special bolt.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Speed Booster Upgrade Kit
description:
Used for crafting Magic Speed Boosters.
Improves the effect of Speed Boosters.

name: Magic Cube (Event)
effects: Self >> There is a 100% chance of causing [ Magic Cube [Hide]].
description:
Mad Professor Macavity made this cube with the help of White Witch Laurena's wand.
When used you can move around unnoticed.
It disappears when you leave the Lost Catacombs.

name: Magic Cube (Event)
effects: Self >> There is a 100% chance of causing [ Magic Cube [Resistance]].
description:
Mad Professor Macavity made this cube with the help of White Witch Laurena's wand.
When used you gain resistance to negative effects.
It disappears when you leave the Lost Catacombs.

name: Magic Cube (Event)
effects: Self >> There is a 100% chance of causing [ Magic Cube [Movement Speed]].
description:
Mad Professor Macavity made this cube with the help of White Witch Laurena's wand.
When used your movement speed is increased.
It disappears when you leave the Lost Catacombs.

name: Magic Cube (Event)
description:
Mad Professor Macavity made this cube with the help of White Witch Laurena's wand.
When used, all targets except the player suffer from a Blackout.
It disappears when you leave the Lost Catacombs.

name: Broken Key (Catacombs Exit)
description:
A key which would open the exit to the catacombs...
If only it weren't broken!
It disappears when you leave the Lost Catacombs.

name: Savage Dyes
description:
Use the Savage Dyes to pimp up the Faux Hawk Undercut and Choppy Bangs hairstyles.
[Note]
Can only be used once for one hairstyle.
Cannot be applied to other hairstyles.
Hairstyle cannot be dyed again afterwards.

name: Jelly Rolls Hair Wax
description:
Changes the look of your hair to a Jelly Rolls hairstyle.
[Note]
Cannot be used by adventurers.
Only for male characters.

name: Faux Hawk Undercut Hair Wax
description:
Changes the look of your hair to a Faux Hawk Undercut hairstyle.
[Note]
Cannot be used by adventurers.
Only for male characters.

name: French Braid Hair Wax
description:
Changes the look of your hair to a French Braid ponytail.
[Note]
Cannot be used by adventurers.
Only for female characters.

name: Choppy Bangs Hair Wax
description:
Changes the look of your hair to Choppy Bangs.
[Note]
Cannot be used by adventurers.
Only for female characters.

name: Cuarry Bank Debit Card
description:
What's in your wallet?
This card allows you to use the Cuarry Bank from (almost) anywhere.
[Note]
Cannot be used in certain zones.
Disappears after one use.

name: Glob of Slime
description:
A glob of slime.
Apparently it has a positive effect on men.

name: Familiar Mask
description: A mask which seems strangely familiar.

name: Broken Key
description: A piece of a broken key.

name: Dragon's Breath
description: The powerful energy of a dragon.

name: Pure Essence of Fire
description:
Pure unadulterated energy.
The pure concentrated energy of fire.

name: Fafnir's Energy
description: The embodiment of Fafnir's energy.

name: Fafnir's Horn
description:
Fafnir's Horn.
It's very hard and sharp.

name: Fafnir's Heart
description:
It contains Fafnir's mana.
Extremely hot!

name: Fafnir's Molar
description:
Fafnir's Molar.
It's very sharp.

name: Fafnir's Scale
description:
Fafnir's Scale.
It's very hard.

name: Ancient Coin Bag
description: This bag contains some ancient coins.

name: Fafnir's Bugle
description:
A bugle which was carved out of the greedy old dragon Fafnir's horn.
It creates a magnificent sound.
Use it to return to town.
Your current location will be saved. You can go back to that location with an Amulet of Return.
Can be used unlimited times.

name: Shining Parchment Scroll
description: Quest item.

name: Parchment Scroll
description: Quest item.

name: Mithril Medal
description:
A medal which you can win in the Combat Arena.
Only the bravest warriors will get one.

name: Gold Medal
description:
This valuable gold medal is given to the person
who wins in the Team Arena.
Only the bravest can get the gold medal.

name: Silver Medal
description:
This valuable silver medal is given to the person
who faced the challenge in the Team Arena, but unfortunately did not win.

name: Team Arena Snack
description:
The Team Arena Snack slowly restores HP and MP by +3,500 each.
[Note]
Can only be eaten in the team arena.
[Limit]
5 snacks

name: Element of Balance
description:
The element imbued with the Energy of Balance.
5 Elements of Balance can be converted into an Essence of Balance.

name: Essence of Balance
description:
The essence imbued with the Energy of Balance.
5 Essences of Balance can be converted into a Crystal of Balance.

name: Crystal of Balance
description:
The crystal imbued with the Energy of Balance.
Required for production.

name: Relic of the First Tribes
description:
Can be sold in the shop.
After the fall of the ancient civilisation, this relic was long lost in the wilderness.
It might not be in particularly good condition, but it has archaeological value.

name: Intact Relic of the First Tribes
description:
Can be sold in the shop.
It is in very good condition and has great archaeological value.
You'll receive a decent reward if you take it to a dealer in antiquities.

name: Mark of the Zealot
description:
The mark which every zealot carries with him.
The true purpose of this mark is unknown, but it is beset with a jewel in the middle.

name: Bacoom Horn
description:
The horn of Bacoom.
It is as tough as steel.

name: Bacoom Tail
description:
Tastes delicious when cooked properly.
Gourmets will doubtless consider this a delicacy.

name: Damaged Orichalcum
description:
Orichalcum is a very special metal, one that was in use in ancient times.
Unfortunately, as it is damaged, it isn't worth much any more.

name: Intact Orichalcum
description:
Orichalcum is a very special metal, one that was in use in ancient times.
Its value depends on the salesman.

name: Floatstone
description: It looks like a regular stone, but it floats when supplied with mana.

name: Silk
description: A soft and delicate material.

name: Soul of Innocence
description: The energy of innocent souls forms the core.

name: Unidentified Metal
description: A piece of metal of unknown origins.

name: Unknown Sanctuary
description: This is used in the zealots' ceremony.

name: Silver Thread
description: This silver thread has a shiny lustre.

name: Golden Thread
description: This golden thread looks very valuable.

name: [Beginner] PvP Damage Boost
description:
Using this you can activate the following effect.
[Effect]
Increases damage in PvP by 1%.
[Note]
Can be used from champion level 10 or higher.

name: [Intermediate] PvP Damage Boost
description:
Using this you can activate the following effect.
[Effect]
Increases damage in PvP by 2%.
[Note]
Can be used from champion level 20 or higher.
You must learn the previous skill.

name: [Advanced] PvP Damage Boost
description:
Using this you can activate the following effect.
[Effect]
Increases damage in PvP by 3%.
[Note]
Can be used from champion level 30 or higher.
You must learn the previous skill.

name: [Expert] PvP Damage Boost
description:
Using this you can activate the following effect.
[Effect]
Increases damage in PvP by 5%.
[Note]
Can be used from champion level 40 or higher.
You must learn the previous skill.

name: [Beginner] PvP Defence Boost
description:
Using this you can activate the following effect.
[Effect]
Increases defence in PvP by 1%.
[Note]
Can be used from champion level 15 or higher.

name: [Intermediate] PvP Defence Boost
description:
Using this you can activate the following effect.
[Effect]
Increases defence in PvP by 2%.
[Note]
Can be used from champion level 25 or higher.
You must learn the previous skill.

name: [Advanced] PvP Defence Boost
description:
Using this you can activate the following effect.
[Effect]
Increases defence in PvP by 3%.
[Note]
Can be used from champion level 35 or higher.
You must learn the previous skill.

name: [Expert] PvP Defence Boost
description:
Using this you can activate the following effect.
[Effect]
Increases defence in PvP by 5%.
[Note]
Can be used from champion level 45 or higher.
You must learn the previous skill.

name: Journal of the Forgotten Hero D (1)
description:
Using this you can activate the following effect.
[Effect]
Increases physical strength by 80.
[Note]
Can be used from champion level 38 or higher.

name: Journal of the Forgotten Hero S (1)
description:
Using this you can activate the following effect.
[Effect]
Increases agility by 80.
[Note]
Can be used from champion level 38 or higher.

name: Journal of the Forgotten Hero J (1)
description:
Using this you can activate the following effect.
[Effect]
Increases intelligence by 80.
[Note]
Can be used from champion level 38 or higher.

name: Journal of the Forgotten Hero M (1)
description:
Using this you can activate the following effect.
[Effect]
Increases maximum HP by 4000.
[Note]
Can be used from champion level 38 or higher.

name: Journal of the Unknown Hero (1)
description:
Using this you can activate the following effect.
[Effect]
Increases maximum MP by 4000.
[Note]
Can be used from champion level 38 or higher.

name: Defensive Strategy of Lord Cuarry's Knights (1)
description:
Using this you can activate the following effect.
[Effect]
Increases overall defence power by 30.
[Note]
Can be used from champion level 28 or higher.

name: Attack Strategy of Lord Cuarry's Knights (1)
description:
Using this you can activate the following effect.
[Effect]
Increases overall attack power by 30.
[Note]
Can be used from champion level 28 or higher.

name: Fairy Affinity (1)
description:
Using this you can activate the following effect.
[Effect]
Increases all elemental resistances by 10.
[Note]
Can be used from champion level 28 or higher.

name: Aurelius Roshu's Primordial History (1)
description:
Using this you can activate the following effect.
[Effect]
Increases experience earned by 3%.
[Note]
Can be used from champion level 18 or higher.

name: Journal of the Akamur Merchants (1)
description:
Using this you can activate the following effect.
[Effect]
Increases gold earned by 3%.
[Note]
Can be used from champion level 18 or higher.

name: Special
description: Dismantle items to receive random materials.

name: Journal of the Forgotten Hero D (2)
description:
Using this you can activate the following effect.
[Effect]
Increases physical strength by 100.
[Note]
Can only be used from champion level 48.

name: Journal of the Forgotten Hero S (2)
description:
Using this you can activate the following effect.
[Effect]
Increases agility by 100.
[Note]
Can only be used from champion level 48.

name: Journal of the Forgotten Hero J (2)
description:
Using this you can activate the following effect.
[Effect]
Increases intelligence by 100.
[Note]
Can only be used from champion level 48.

name: Journal of the Forgotten Hero M (2)
description:
Using this you can activate the following effect.
[Effect]
Increases HP by 6000.
[Note]
Can only be used from champion level 48.

name: Journal of the Unknown Hero (2)
description:
Using this you can activate the following effect.
[Effect]
Increases MP by 6000.
[Note]
Can only be used from champion level 48.

name: Defensive Strategy of Lord Cuarry's Knights (2)
description:
Using this you can activate the following effect.
[Effect]
Increases overall defence power by 50.
[Note]
Can only be used from champion level 38.

name: Attack Strategy of Lord Cuarry's Knights (2)
description:
Using this you can activate the following effect.
[Effect]
Increases overall attack power by 50.
[Note]
Can only be used from champion level 38.

name: Tarot Card (Fool)
effects: Self >> Movement speed is increased by 1.Self >> Increases Gold earned by 10%.
description:
You behave like a fool.
Increases movement speed by +1 and gold earned by 10%.
Required level: 1
Usage duration: 3 hours
Duration starts as soon as you use it.

name: Tarot Card (The Magician)
effects: Self >> Mana for using skills is decreased by 20%. (Includes magic.)Self >> All elemental resistance is increased by 3.Self >> Maximum MP is increased by 2500.
description:
The power of magic.
Reduces mana consumption by 20%, increases maximum MP by 2,500 and all elemental resistances by 3.
Required level: 1
Usage duration: 3 hours
Duration starts as soon as you use it.

name: Tarot Card (The Lovers)
effects: Self >> Maximum HP is increased by 2000.Self >> Maximum MP is increased by 2000.Self >> All attacks are increased by 50.
description:
You can feel the fire of love.
Increases your maximum HP and MP by +2,000 and all attacks by 50.
Required level: 1
Usage duration: 3 hours
Duration starts as soon as you use it.

name: Tarot Card (The Hermit)
effects: Self >> All defence powers are increased by 100.Self >> All elemental resistance is increased by 3.Self >> Maximum HP is increased by 800.
description:
Grants you the power of a hermit.
Increases all defence stats by +100, your maximum HP by +800 and all elemental resistances by +3.
Required level: 1
Usage duration: 3 hours
Duration starts as soon as you use it.

name: Tarot Card (Death)
effects: Self >> Hit rate of all attacks is increased by 150.Self >> All attacks are increased by 150.
description:
You suffer from the fear of death.
Increases hit rate and attack power by 150.
Required level: 1
Usage duration: 3 hours. Duration starts as soon as you use it.

name: Tarot Card (The Devil)
effects: Self >> Movement speed is increased by 1.Self >> Maximum HP is increased by 800.Self >> All attacks are increased by 250.
description:
Gives you demonic strength.
Increases movement speed by +1, HP by +800 and all attacks by +250.
Required level: 1
Usage duration: 3 hours
Duration starts as soon as you use it.

name: Tarot Card (The Tower)
effects: Self >> Increases Gold earned by 10%.Self >> Experience gain is increased by 10%.
description:

Increases gold and experience earned by 10%.

Usage duration: 3 hours
Duration starts as soon as you use it.

name: Tarot Card (The Star)
effects: Self >> Movement speed is increased by 1.Self >> Experience gain is increased by 15%.
description:

Increases movement speed by +1 and combat experience by 15%.
Required level: 1
Usage duration: 3 hours

name: Mount Bead
description:
You can store a mount in this bead.
Enables you to trade with it.
[Instructions]
Double-click to open the corresponding window.
Drag the mount into the slot,
click on 'Store mount' and it will be placed in the bead.
Double-click the bead to get it back out again.
[Note]
The bead will disappear when you take the mount out again.

name: Young Rudolph Bushi
description:
If the Young Rudolph Bushi accompanies you for at least an hour, you will receive a Christmas Gift Box.
[Note]
During the winter event you can only receive one Christmas Gift Box per day.

name: Elkaim
description:
Fire Fairy

This fairy carries the concentrated power of fire within her.
The longer you have her by your side in combat, the stronger her elemental attack power becomes.
(against monsters +/-15 levels)
This is added to your character's elemental power.
The fairy can increase your elemental power by up to 80%.
No experience is gained for defeating NosVille monsters.

name: Ladine
description:
Water Fairy

This fairy carries the concentrated power of water within her.
The longer you have her by your side in combat, the stronger her elemental attack power becomes.
(against monsters +/-15 levels)
This is added to your character's elemental power.
The fairy can increase your elemental power by up to 80%.
No experience is gained for defeating NosVille monsters.

name: Rumial
description:
Light Fairy

This fairy carries the concentrated power of the light within her.
The longer you have her by your side in combat, the stronger her elemental attack power becomes.
(against monsters +/-15 levels)
This is added to your character's elemental power.
The fairy can increase your elemental power by up to 80%.
No experience is gained for defeating NosVille monsters.

name: Varik
description:
Shadow Fairy

This fairy carries the concentrated power of shadows within her.
The longer you have her by your side in combat, the stronger her elemental attack power becomes.
(against monsters +/-15 levels)
This is added to your character's elemental power.
The fairy can increase your elemental power by up to 80%.
No experience is gained for defeating NosVille monsters.

name: Mysterious Egg
description:
This is a mysterious egg.
[Instructions]
Double-click on the item in your Miniland.
The egg must have 100% HP to hatch. It will then hatch automatically.
When the egg accompanies you, it will receive 1 HP every second.
When you hunt monsters with it, it will receive 20 HP per monster.
If you feed it with a Growth Fruit, it will receive 10,000 HP.

name: Seraphim Egg
description:
The egg contains Seraphim.
When you use it in your Miniland, a Seraphim hatches and becomes your pet.

Usage duration: 3 hours
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Champion Amulet for Increasing Rarity
description:
If you have one with you when betting, your rarity level will be increased by 1.
(No failure)
[Note]
Can only be used on equipment with a champion level.
Additionally random shell options will be applied.
The rarity level can be improved up to a maximum of 8.

description:

of success when betting (rarity level) by 10%.

name: Aegir's Specialist Partner Card
description:
Specialist Partner Card of the water element.
Can be worn by Tom and Kliff.
I'm not fat... I'm just wearing lots of layers!

name: Specialist Partner Card Holder
description:
Used for storing a Specialist Partner Card, enabling it to be traded between players.
[Usage]
Double-click on the Card Holder and then select the desired Specialist Partner Card to store it inside.
To take it out again, double-click the Card Holder again and it will disappear.

The only question is whether it's really appropriate.

name: Lightning Rune
effects: Self >> Hit rate of all attacks is increased by 200.Self >> Concentration is increased by 100 during the magic attack.Self >> All element energies are increased by 10.Self >> Increases PvP attack power by 12%.
description:
This rune contains the power of lightning.
It increases the hit rate by +200,
improves concentration by +100
and increases total elemental power by +10.
PvP attack power is increased by 12%.
Required level: 30
Usage duration: 1 hour
Duration starts as soon as you use it.

name: Wave Rune
effects: Self >> Movement speed is increased by 1.Self >> Maximum HP is increased by 1500.Self >> Maximum MP is increased by 1500.Self >> Defence power in PvP is increased by 12%.
description:
This rune contains the power of waves.
It increases movement speed by +1
and increases maximum HP and MP by +1,500 each.
PvP defence power is increased by 12%.
Required level: 30
Usage duration: 1 hour
Duration starts as soon as you use it.

name: Cloud Rune
effects: Self >> Movement speed is increased by 1.Self >> Maximum HP is increased by 3000.Self >> Maximum MP is increased by 3000.Self >> All elemental resistance is increased by 15.
description:
This rune contains the power of clouds.
It increases movement speed by +1
and increases maximum HP and MP by +3,000 each.
Total elemental power is increased by +15.
Required level: 30
Usage duration: 1 hour
Duration starts as soon as you use it.

name: Wind Rune
effects: Self >> Movement speed is increased by 2.Self >> Experience gain is increased by 15%.Self >> Increases Gold earned by 15%.
description:
This rune contains the power of wind.
It increases movement speed by +2
and increases experience gain by 15%.
Gold earned increases by 15%.
Required level: 30
Usage duration: 1 hour
Duration starts as soon as you use it.

name: Fire Rune
effects: Self >> All attacks are increased by 80.Self >> Increases PvP attack power by 8%.Self >> Defence power in PvP is increased by 8%.
description:
This rune contains the power of fire.
It increases total attack power by +80
and increases attack and defence power in PvP by +8% each.
Required level: 30
Usage duration: 1 hour
Duration starts as soon as you use it.

name: NosMerchant Medal (30 Days)
description:
When you use it, the following effects will last for 30 days.
[Listing Effect]
1. Listing fees are dropped.
2. You can list up to 100 items at the same time.
3. Sale price limit: 1,000,000,000 gold.
4. Offer period of up to 30 days.
[Effect on Goods Offered During Period]
1. Storage after sale: 30 days.
2. Sale fees are dropped.
[Important Note]
The number of items listed includes offered items, items that have not been collected from the NosBazaar, and any listings that have expired.

name: NosMerchant Medal (7 Days)
description:
When you use it, the following effects will last for 7 days.
[Listing Effect]
1. Listing fees are dropped.
2. You can list up to 100 items at the same time.
3. Sale price limit: 1,000,000,000 gold.
4. Offer period of up to 30 days.
[Effect on Goods Offered During Period]
1. Storage after sale: 30 days.
2. Sale fees are dropped.
[Important Note]
The number of items listed includes offered items, items that have not been collected from the NosBazaar, and any listings that have expired.

name: NosMerchant Medal (1 Day/Event)
description:
When you use it, the following effects will last for 1 day.
[Listing Effect]
1. Listing fees are dropped.
2. You can list up to 100 items at the same time.
3. Sale price limit: 1,000,000,000 gold.
4. Offer period of up to 30 days.
[Effect on Goods Offered During Period]
1. Storage after sale: 30 days.
2. Sale fees are dropped.
[Important Note]
The number of items listed includes offered items, items that have not been collected from the NosBazaar, and any listings that have expired.

name: Sealed Christmas Vessel
description:
A special vessel from Santa.
Various monsters are contained in the sealed vessel, including the Young Rudolph Bushi.
[Instructions]
Use it on general maps, in your Miniland or in the villages. Sealed monsters will appear.
[Note]
Monsters released in your Miniland will disappear when you log out or leave the Miniland.
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Christmas Gift Box (Event)
description:
This gift box comes from Santa himself.
You will receive one of a selection of items.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Movement Scroll (Event)
description:
This provides you a one-off journey, ride or flight
on one of the various mounts.
Which one you receive is entirely up to chance.
The scroll will be consumed as soon as you mount up.
[Dismounting]
Use the Movement Scroll again to dismount. This will not consume a scroll.
If you die or log out while you are on a vehicle/mount, you will automatically dismount.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Mystical Flame (Event)
description:
A mystical flame.
You can have it examined by Professor Edward.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Small Christmas Box
description:
The Small Christmas Box is dropped by monsters from the Sealed Christmas Vessel.
Open the box to receive one of the various items.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Medium Christmas Box
description:
Ugly Rudolf drops this Medium Christmas Box when he appears from the Sealed Christmas Vessel.
Open the box to receive one of various items.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Large Christmas Box
description:
Abominable Rudolf drops this Large Christmas Box when he appears from the Sealed Christmas Vessel.
Open the box to receive one of various items.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

description:
Mimi Mentor gives you this gift box in gratitude for your help.
Contains a random item.
[Note]

name: Bushtail Costume Scroll (Event)
description:
Transform yourself into one of the great variety of bushtails
and gain 10% more experience points for 30 minutes.
With a little luck you will transform into the Cute Bunny
and get 30% more experience points.
Can only be used when in normal form.

name: Stolen Gift Bag (Event)
description:
Mimi Mentor is searching for this bag.
When you bring her 5 Stolen Gift Bags and 5 Stolen Lucky Charms,
she'll give you a New Year's Gift Box.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Stolen Lucky Charm (Event)
description:
Mimi Mentor is searching for this charm.
When you bring her 5 Stolen Gift Bags and 5 Stolen Lucky Charms,
she'll give you a New Year's Gift Box.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Fire Wings
description:
Transforms your specialist's wings into Fire Wings.
[Instructions]
1. Transform into a specialist.
2. Use this item to change your wings.
[Note]
1. You can only change the wings into Fire Wings with an upgraded Specialist Card of +1 or higher.
2. The effect disappears when you put your Specialist Card in a card holder.

name: Chicken Costume Upgrade Scroll (Event)
description:
When you use the scroll, an upgrade window will appear in which you can improve your Pirate Specialist Card.
You will not need any other items to carry out the upgrade.
Only the upgrade scroll will be consumed.

name: Easter Signpost
description: Set up this signpost so that other players can visit your Miniland for 60 minutes.

name: Chicken Queen Seal (Event)
description:
You can enter the Chicken Queen Raid via the Nest Surroundings map.
Required level: 20-99
Recommended size: 10+ players
Upon use you will be made raid leader.
As leader you can invite other members by clicking the 'Team' button.
Once the leader enters the raid, the other team members will automatically follow.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Magic Egg (Event)
description:
If the player dies during the Chicken Queen raid,
it will automatically be consumed
and the raid leader will not lose any hearts.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Pirate Seal (Event)
description:
Use this for the Pirate Raid on the pirate ship in Port Alveus.
Required level: 20-99
Minimum no. of players: 10
All participants need the Pirate Seal to register for the raid. This is consumed when you start the raid.
[Instructions]
You must be the leader of a raid team.
The raid leader creates a team of other players by clicking the 'Team' button.
When the leader has crossed the portal to the raid, the raid starts for everyone.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Piece of the Pirate SP (Event)
description:
One part of the pirate SP
If you take one part of the pirate SP and 1,000 Gold to Captain Jack Panon, you can gamble for the pirate SP.[Caution]
The item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Pirate's Do-Rag (Event)
description:
This is a swashbuckling pirate's do-rag.
You can loot it by hunting the Pirate Kangpen or Pirate Jackpen.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Mariner's Symbol (Event)
description:
The mariner's symbol stands for the seaman's honour.
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: O'Peng's Treasure Map (Event)
description:
This item shows the way to the hiding place of Captain Pete O'Peng's treasure chest.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Lime Juice (Event)
description:
This healthy lime juice restores 800 HP and 800 MP.
Can be used to restore both the player's and NosMate's HP and MP.
All the bad symptoms of seasickness will subside.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Pirate Flag Signpost
description: Set up this signpost so that other players can visit your Miniland for 60 minutes.

name: Ice Wings
description:
Transforms your specialist's wings into Ice Wings.
[Instructions]
1. Transform into a specialist.
2. Use this item to change your wings.
[Note]
1. You can only change the wings into Ice Wings with an improved Specialist Card +1 or higher.
2. The effect disappears when you put your Specialist Card in a card holder.

name: Elemental Full Moon Box
description:
The box contains Fire or Ice Wings and other items.
You will receive one of the following items:
1x Ice Wings
1x Fire Wings
50x Full Moon Crystal

name: Elemental Feather Chest
description:
The box contains Fire or Ice Wings and other items.
You will receive one of the following items:
1x Ice Wings
1x Fire Wings
50x Angel's Feather

name: Christmas Gift Box
description:
This gift box comes from Santa himself.
You will receive one of a selection of gifts.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Pyjama Upgrade Scroll
description:
When you use the scroll, an upgrade window will appear in which you can improve your Pyjama Specialist Card.
You will not need any other items to carry out the upgrade.
Only the upgrade scroll will be consumed.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Christmas Signpost
description:
Set up this festive signpost so that for 60 minutes, other players can visit your Miniland.
The signpost looks like a Christmas tree.

name: Santa's Blessing
description:
A special item for the winter event.
Increases combat and job experience earned by 100%.
(Duration: 1 hour)
This blessing has the same effect as Ancelloan's Blessing.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Rudolph's Blessing
description:
A special item for the winter event.
Increases experience earned by your NosMate by 50%.
Movement speed increases by 2
(Duration: 1 hour)
This blessing has the same effect as the Guardian Angel's Blessing.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Christmas Blessing
description:
A special item for the winter event.
If you transform into a specialist,
your job level experience gain will increase by 50%.
(Duration: 1 hour)
This blessing has the same effect as the Soulstone Blessing.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Mysterious Bell Bag
description:
The bag contains bells which allow you to catch the monsters from the Sealed Christmas Vessel.
Which bell you receive is decided at random.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Christmas Costume Box
description:
The box contains a Christmas costume and hat.
You'll look great in them!
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Movement Scroll
description:
This provides you a one-off journey, ride or flight
on one of the various mounts.
Which one you receive is entirely up to chance.
The scroll will be consumed as soon as you mount up.
[Dismounting]
Use the Movement Scroll again to dismount. This will not consume a scroll.
If you die or log out while you are on a vehicle/mount, you will automatically dismount.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Magical Wool
description:
This is the magical wool that Soraya Style can't wait to get her hands on.
The wool is enchanted and particularly warm.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Magical Knitting Needle
description:
This is the magical knitting needle that Soraya Style urgently needs.
The needle will be used to make a scarf out of the magical wool.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Soraya's Scarf
description:
The scarf that Soraya Style made herself for Calvin Coach.
It keeps the cold out because it is knitted from magical wool.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Ice Flower Crystal
description:
Malcolm Mix is on the hunt for the Ice Flower Crystal.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Archangel Wings
description:
Transforms your specialist's wings into Archangel Wings.
[Instructions]
1. Transform into a specialist.
2. Use this item to change your wings.
[Effect]
Increases your light element by 10.
Movement speed +1
[Note]
1. You can only change the wings with an improved Specialist Card +1 or higher.
2. The wings disappear when you put your Specialist Card in a card holder.

name: Lord Draco's Raid Seal
description:
You can enter Lord Draco's Raid via the Dragon Cavern Path near the Volcano Gate.
Recommended level: 75-99
All players above level 75 may use the raid seal.
[Instructions]
Use to become the team leader.
Once you are the leader, click other characters
and click the 'Team' button. When ready, head to the raid entrance.
When the leader enters the raid,
all other members will follow automatically.
[Note]
Characters higher than the recommended level may enter the raid, but will receive a penalty.

name: Time-Space: Heroes of Fire
description:
Quest item.
Click on the stone in your inventory to be transported immediately to the Time-Space.

name: Specialist Card of Experience
description:
This specialist card increases your experience stats to 100%.
[Instructions]
When you are carrying the specialist card, double-click on it.
[Note]
If your experience stats have already reached 100%, you cannot use this item.

Movement speed +1
Note:

2. The wings disappear when you place your Specialist Card in a Card Holder.

description: With your partner you can permanently take advantage of 50 extra inventory slots.

name: Pet Basket (Permanent)
description:
With your NosMate's help you can permanently open your warehouse any time, any place.
If your pet is dead, you cannot use this item.
You also require a warehouse in your Miniland.

[Instructions]

Provides a certain chance of firing a magical arrow when you use magic or ranged attack skills.
Movement speed +1
[Note]
1. You can only change the wings into Zephyr Wings with an improved Specialist Card +1 or higher.
2. The effect disappears when you put your Specialist Card in a card holder.

name: Martial Artist Starter Pack
description:
Contains standard equipment for Martial Artists.
[Note]
The items contained within cannot be traded.

name: Skin for Frigg
description:
The speed of your
partner increases by 2
with this item.
This outfit also gives
your partner a special
look.

[Instructions]
Select your partner and
double-click the suit in your
inventory. If you place your
partner in a bead this item
will disappear.

The speed of your
