name: Martial Artist Starter Pack
description:
Contains standard equipment for Martial Artists.
[Note]
The rarity level of the items in this pack will be determined at random.

name: Novice Mount Scroll
description:
Use this item to board a random mount (Magic Scooter, Magic Carpet, Magic White Tiger, Magical Skis, Magical Snowboard or the 'Billy Boneshaker' Bike).
Use this item again to dismount.
[Attributes]
Movement speed: 17
[With Speed Booster]
Speed +2
Duration +3
[Note]
Level limit: below 70
This item is not tradeable.

name: Magic Jaguar
description:
Summon your Magic Jaguar mount with this item.
Increases your movement speed.
Use this item again to dismount.
There is no level requirement.
[Attributes]
Speed: 20
Speed in the desert and the Region of the Burning Sword +2
Speed in Glacernon +3
[With Speed Booster]
Removes all negative effects under level 4.
Speed +4
Duration +2
There is a certain chance for the Shadow Prowler buff to take effect when the Speed Booster ends.

name: Magic Jaguar Box
description:
This box contains a Magic Jaguar.
[Note]
Once you take the Magic Jaguar out of the box, you can no longer trade it.

name: Cuarry Bank Savings Book
description:
No need to keep all your money under your pillow any more.
Use this to check your balance at the Cuarry Bank.
[Note]
If you lose your savings book, you can get a new one from the Cuarry Bank Representative.

name: Mega Titan Wings
description:
Changes your specialist's wings into Mega Titan Wings.
[Instructions]
1. Transform into a specialist.
2. Use this item to change your wings.
[Effect]
Damage to opponents in PvP increases by 3%.
Increases movement speed by 1.
[Note]
1. You can only change the wings into Mega Titan Wings with an improved Specialist Card +1 or higher.
2. The effect disappears when you put your Specialist Card in a card holder.

name: Cuarry Bank VIP Medal (10 Days)
description:
You earn VIP status at the Cuarry Bank and do not need to pay any fees.
[Note]
Only valid for 10 days.

name: Cuarry Bank VIP Medal (30 Days)
description:
You earn VIP status at the Cuarry Bank and do not need to pay any fees.
[Note]
Only valid for 30 days.

name: Mad Professor Macavity's Raid Ticket (Event)
description:
This ticket allows you to reset the daily limit for Mad Professor Macavity's Raid.
Double-click to use.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Mother Nature's Rune Pack
description:
Mother Nature's runes grant you unimaginable powers.
Contains all Mother Nature's regular runes.
There is also a small chance to receive a rare rune.

name: Pretty Witch Box (Event)
description:
A box awarded by White Witch Laurena.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Mad Professor Macavity's Junk Box (Event)
description:
This chest contains an item hidden by Mad Professor Macavity.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Resistance Supply Box (Event)
description:
Supplies delivered to Mad Professor Macavity's resistance.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: White Witch Laurena's Wand (Event)
description:
The wand belonging to White Witch Laurena which was stolen by Mad Professor Macavity.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Mad Professor Macavity's Raid Seal
description:
You can enter Mad Professor Macavity's Raid via the Lost Catacombs in NosVille.
Recommended level: 30-99
Minimum no. of players: 8
[Instructions]
Use to become the team leader.
As leader you can invite other members by clicking the 'Team' button.
When the leader enters the raid, all other members will follow automatically.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Lich Mystery Chest
description:
This valuable chest from Yertirand changed the lich.
Who knows what could be inside? It looks very pretty though!

name: Lich Mystery Chest
description:
This valuable chest from Yertirand changed the lich.
Who knows what could be inside? It looks very pretty though!

name: Alchemist's Bag
description:
Quest item.
A bag with unknown contents.

name: Bushi Stolen Goods Chest
description:
A chest containing goods that the bushis have either stolen or collected.
It has a handle so it can be carried in case of emergency.
Can be traded for a Bronze Acorn.

name: Old Viking Chest
description:
A chest containing viking treasures.
Is it real or a scam?
Can be traded for a Golden Acorn.

name: Old Goth Chest
description:
A chest containing goth treasures.
Is it real or a scam?
Can be traded for a Golden Acorn.

name: Bushi King Defence Raid Seal
description:
Use this item to open the Bushi King Defence Raid.
[Note]
Number of players: 2 teams of 10-15 players each. Maximum 30 players.
Only players who have successfully joined can take part. Any extra players will take part in the next round.
This raid needs at least 20 players.
If there aren't enough players, the raid won't begin.
If the raid is cancelled, the raid seal will be used up.
If the raid has already been started, the seal cannot be used again.

name: Sheep Farm Raid Seal
description:
Use this item to open the Sheep Farm Raid.
[Note]
Number of players: 5-30 players.
Only players who have successfully joined can take part. Any extra players will take part in the next round.
This raid needs at least 20 players.
If there aren't enough players the raid won't begin.
If the raid is cancelled the raid seal will be used up.
If the raid has already been started, the seal cannot be used again.

name: Dodge Meteor Raid Seal
description:
Use this item to open the Dodge Meteor Raid.
[Note]
Number of players: 10-50 players.
Only players who have successfully joined can take part. Any extra players will take part in the next round.
This raid needs at least 20 players.
If there aren't enough players the raid won't begin.
If the raid is cancelled the raid seal will be used up.
If the raid has already been started, the seal cannot be used again.

name: Partner Slot Expansion
description:
This item permanently expands your partner slots by an additional 1 slot.
This allows you to collect more partners.
[Note]
With the Partner Slot Expansion you can expand your partner slots 9 times up to a maximum of 12 slots.

name: Key to Castle Aria
description:
You can enter the raid in Castle Aria.
Recommended level: 70-99
Recommended players: 5
[Instructions]
Use to become the team leader.
Once you are the leader, click other characters
and click the 'Team' button. When ready, head to the raid entrance. When the leader enters the raid, all other members will follow automatically.

name: Akashic Record
description:
Use this to start the Incomplete Fernon raid on the Temple Site.
Required level: 92-99
Minimum no. of players: 8
[Instructions]
You must be the leader of a raid team.
The raid leader creates a team of other players by clicking the 'Team' button.
When the leader has crossed the portal to the raid, the raid starts for everyone.
[Note]
Teamwork is key to victory!
The properties of Specialist Cards are also very important.

name: Toolbox
description:
This chest contains parts and tools for repair works.
You will receive one of the following items:
Giant Bolt
Gear
Hammer
Damaged Orichalcum
Brick
Coolant

name: Mystic Heaven Military Supplies
description: Contains various items for the troops from Mystic Heaven.

name: Hellord Military Supplies
description: Contains various items for the troops from Hellord.

name: Mystic Heaven Supply Ticket
description:
A supply ticket for the soldiers from Mystic Heaven.
Collect a certain number of tickets and bring them to Sarakael.
They can be exchanged for Mystic Heaven Military Supplies.

name: Hellord Supply Ticket
description:
A supply ticket for the soldiers from Hellord.
Collect a certain number of tickets and bring them to Lilith.
They can be exchanged for Hellord Military Supplies.

name: Prayer Note
description: The crusader's prayers are written on this piece of paper.

name: Rosary Beads
description: An accessory used when praying.

name: Bloodstained Testament
description:
Someone's last will and testament.
It is covered in blood.

name: Akashic Record
description:
A document written by Ancelloan.
It describes how to seal away Fernon.

name: Time-Space Fragment
description:
A fragment which can only be collected in the Time-Space.
It contains a glimmer of the power of Time-Spaces.

name: Time-Space Essence
description:
An essence which can only be collected in the Time-Space.
It contains the power of Time-Spaces.

name: Time-Space Crystal Essence
description:
A crystal which can only be collected in the Time-Space.
It contains the great power of Time-Spaces.

name: Natural Magic Paper
description: The paper is covered in strange markings.

name: Tattered Diary
description:
A diary with the crusader's records.
The middle portion has been torn out.

name: Tattered Scroll
description: Part of this scroll has been torn off.

name: Costume Fusion
description:
Allows you to change the appearance of your costume.
To do so, you must select both the base and design costumes.

name: Awakened Zenas Egg
description:
The egg contains the fairy Zenas.
The light is shaped like an egg.
There is a small chance to activate the fairy.

name: Awakened Erenia Egg
description:
The egg contains the fairy Erenia.
The shadows are shaped like an egg.
There is a small chance to activate the fairy.

name: Awakened Fernon Egg
description:
The egg contains the fairy Fernon.
Light and shadow are fused into the shape of this egg.
If the conditions are met, this fairy will be activated.

name: Nutcracker Set (Permanent)
description:
This set contains the full Nutcracker outfit.
It consists of:
1x Nutcracker Shako (Permanent)
1x Nutcracker Uniform (Permanent)

name: Unstable Energy
description:
Quest item.
Unstable Energy can react in unexpected ways... it's unstable, after all!

name: Holy Blood
description: This is the blood of the angels from Mystic Heaven. It is full of holy power.

name: Dark Energy Stone
description: The stone of the demons of Hellord is fed with dark energy.

name: Raid Seal: Audience with Erenia
description:
You can enter the raid via Hell's Gate 4 next to the statue of Erenia
once the goddess' bar has been filled.
Recommended level: 90-99
Players: 15
Recommended players: 15
[Instructions]
Use to become the team leader.
Once you are the leader, click other characters
and click the 'Team' button. When ready, head to the raid entrance.
When the leader enters the raid,
all other members will follow automatically.

name: Raid Seal: Audience with Zenas
description:
You can enter the raid via the portal next to the statue of Zenas.
Recommended level: 90-99
Players: 15
Recommended players: 15
[Instructions]
Use to become the team leader.
Once you are the leader, click other characters and click the 'Team' button.
When ready, head to the raid entrance. When the leader enters the raid, all other members will follow automatically.

name: Ancelloan's Accessory Production Scroll
description:
This parchment describes how to produce accessories with Ancelloan's power.
It includes the formula for creating a new accessory.
[Production]
1. All materials must be present in your inventory.
2. Double-click on the scroll to open the production window.
3. Select the accessory you wish to craft.
4. Drag the necessary equipment items into the window.
5. Click on 'Produce' to complete the process.

name: Ancelloan's Weapon Production Scroll
description:
This parchment describes how to produce weapons with Ancelloan's power.
It includes the formula for creating a new weapon.
[Production]
1. All materials must be present in your inventory.
2. Double-click on the scroll to open the production window.
3. Select the weapon you wish to craft.
4. Drag the necessary equipment items into the window.
5. Click on 'Produce' to complete the process.

name: Ancelloan's Secondary Weapon Production Scroll
description:
This parchment describes how to produce secondary weapons with Ancelloan's power.
It includes the formula for creating a new secondary weapon.
[Production]
1. All materials must be present in your inventory.
2. Double-click on the scroll to open the production window.
3. Select the secondary weapon you wish to craft.
4. Drag the necessary equipment items into the window.
5. Click on 'Produce' to complete the process.

name: Ancelloan's Armour Production Scroll
description:
This parchment describes how to produce armour with Ancelloan's power.
It includes the formula for creating a new piece of armour.
[Production]
1. All materials must be present in your inventory.
2. Double-click on the scroll to open the production window.
3. Select the piece of armour you wish to craft.
4. Drag the necessary equipment items into the window.
5. Click on 'Produce' to complete the process.

name: Box of Honour
description:
Box of Honour
You will receive one of the following items:
1x Arena Booster
1x Arena of Talents Ticket
1x Legendary Medal of Honour
1x Mysterious Medal of Honour
1x Ancient Medal of Honour
1x Excellent Medal of Honour
1x High-Quality Medal of Honour
1x Good Medal of Honour
1x Useful Medal of Honour
1x Medal of Honour

name: Gold Medal Chest
description:
Gold Medal of the Arena
You will receive one of the following items:
1x Legendary Medal of Honour
1x Mysterious Medal of Honour
1x Ancient Medal of Honour
1x Excellent Medal of Honour
1x High-Quality Medal of Honour
1x Good Medal of Honour
1x Useful Medal of Honour

name: Silver Medal Chest
description:
Silver Medal of the Arena
You will receive one of the following items:
1x Legendary Medal of Honour
1x Mysterious Medal of Honour
1x Ancient Medal of Honour
1x Excellent Medal of Honour
1x High-Quality Medal of Honour
1x Good Medal of Honour
1x Useful Medal of Honour
1x Medal of Honour

name: Arena Booster (Talents)
description:
Consumed once each time you win the Arena of Talents.
You receive a medal, additional EXP and gold.
[Note]
Must be in your inventory in order to be used.

name: Legendary Medal of Honour
description:
A medal awarded to those who perform honourable deeds.
You receive 30,000 reputation points.
[Note]
The item will be consumed when clicked.
It cannot be restored once used.

name: Mysterious Medal of Honour
description:
A medal awarded to those who perform honourable deeds.
You receive 20,000 reputation points.
[Note]
The item will be consumed when clicked.
It cannot be restored once used.

name: Ancient Medal of Honour
description:
A medal awarded to those who perform honourable deeds.
You receive 10,000 reputation points.
[Note]
The item will be consumed when clicked.
It cannot be restored once used.

name: Excellent Medal of Honour
description:
A medal awarded to those who perform honourable deeds.
You receive 5,000 reputation points.
[Note]
The item will be consumed when clicked.
It cannot be restored once used.

name: High-Quality Medal of Honour
description:
A medal awarded to those who perform honourable deeds.
You receive 3,000 reputation points.
[Note]
The item will be consumed when clicked.
It cannot be restored once used.

name: Good Medal of Honour
description:
A medal awarded to those who perform honourable deeds.
You receive 1,000 reputation points.
[Note]
The item will be consumed when clicked.
It cannot be restored once used.

name: Useful Medal of Honour
description:
A medal awarded to those who perform honourable deeds.
You receive 500 reputation points.
[Note]
The item will be consumed when clicked.
It cannot be restored once used.

name: Medal of Honour
description:
A medal awarded to those who perform honourable deeds.
You receive 200 reputation points.
[Note]
The item will be consumed when clicked.
It cannot be restored once used.

name: Charred Mask Parchment
description:
This parchment describes how to produce a mask following ancient methods.
[Production]
1. All materials must be present in your inventory.
2. Double-click on the scroll to open the production window.
3. Select the item you wish to craft.
4. Drag the necessary equipment items into the window.
5. Click on 'Produce' to complete the process.

name: Grenigas Accessories Parchment
description:
This parchment describes how to produce accessories with Grenigas' power.
[Production]
1. All materials must be present in your inventory.
2. Double-click on the scroll to open the production window.
3. Select the item you wish to craft.
4. Drag the necessary equipment items into the window.
5. Click on 'Produce' to complete the process.

name: Old Viking Costume (7 Days) - Sketch
description:
This sketch describes how to produce the Old Viking Costume (7 Days).
It includes the formula for creating the costume.
[Production]
1. All materials must be present in your inventory.
2. Double-click on the scroll to open the production window.
3. Select the item you wish to craft.
4. Drag the necessary equipment items into the window.
5. Click on 'Produce' to complete the process.

name: Fafnir's Bugle Blueprints
description:
These blueprints describe how to produce Fafnir's Bugle.
It includes the formula for creating the tool.
[Production]
1. All materials must be present in your inventory.
2. Double-click on the scroll to open the production window.
3. Select the item you wish to craft.
4. Drag the necessary equipment items into the window.
5. Click on 'Produce' to complete the process.

name: Fafnir's Fried Dinner
description:
Immediately restores 20% of your HP/MP.
Removes negative effects up to level 3.
Increases SP by 100.

name: Akamur Merchant Gift Bag
description:
A gift bag that you receive from the Akamur merchants for your help.
When you open the bag, you will receive a random item.

name: Akamur Coupon
description:
A coupon that you receive for helping the Akamur merchant.
Collect several of these and take them to the Akamur Merchant Military Engineer to receive a special gift.
On the rear of the coupon it says: This coupon is not tradeable.

name: Ice Flower
description:
An ice flower from Glacernon.
Because of the biting cold aura, you can't hold too many of these ice flowers. They are also very fragile.

name: Magical Sand
description: none

name: Grenigas Relic
description: none

name: Magical Camel
description:
This item makes you a rider of the magical camel.
Increases your movement speed.
Use this item again to dismount.
There is no level requirement.
[Properties]
Movement speed: 14
Movement speed in the Desert and in the Region of the Burning Sword +6
[With Speed Booster]
Movement speed +2
Duration +5

name: Magical Camel Box (Quest)
description:
A box that you receive for helping the Akamur merchant. Contained within is a magical camel
[Note]
The box is no longer tradeable once you release the camel from the box.

name: Strong Ice Flower Oil
description:
A special oil extracted from the ice flowers in Glacernon.
Effect lasts for two hours.
[Effects]
All attack and defence powers increase by 5%
Protects from the heat of the Burning Sword.

name: Left Side of Grenigas' Raid Seal
description:
The left half of Grenigas' Raid Seal.
[Instructions]
When you bring the left and right pieces of Grenigas' raid seal to Serizad at the Volcano Gate, she will connect the two together to create Grenigas' Raid Seal.

name: Right Side of Grenigas' Raid Seal
description:
The right half of Grenigas' Raid Seal.
[Instructions]
When you bring the left and right pieces of Grenigas' raid seal to Serizad at the Volcano Gate, she will connect the two together to create Grenigas' Raid Seal.

name: Rune Piece
description:
When you bring this to Priestess Serizad at the Volcano Gate, you will be teleported to Grenigas Temple.
Teleporting uses one rune piece.

name: Kertos' Raid Seal
description:
You can enter the Kertos Raid via Kertos' Cave in Kertos' Jaws.
Recommended level: 90-99
[Instructions]
Use to become the team leader.
As leader you can invite other members by clicking the 'Team' button.
When the leader enters the raid, all other members will follow automatically.
[Note]
Characters higher than the recommended level may enter the raid, but will receive a penalty.

name: Valakus' Raid Seal
description:
You can enter the Valakus raid via Valakus' Cave in Valakus' Claws.
Recommended level: 90-99
[Instructions]
Use to become the team leader.
As leader you can invite other members by clicking the 'Team' button.
When the leader enters the raid, all other members will follow automatically.
[Note]
Characters higher than the recommended level may enter the raid, but will receive a penalty.

name: Grenigas' Raid Seal
description:
You can enter the Grenigas Raid via Grenigas Square near Katol's Street.
Recommended level: 90-99
[Instructions]
Use to become the team leader.
As leader you can invite other members by clicking the 'Team' button.
When the leader enters the raid, all other members will follow automatically.
[Note]
Characters higher than the recommended level may enter the raid, but will receive a penalty.

name: Magical Camel Parchment Scroll
description:
You will become a knight of the camel with the Magical Camel Parchment Scroll.
When you use the item the scroll will disappear from your inventory.
With this you are quicker in the desert, in other regions you travel at normal speed.
[Instructions]
Use the Magical Camel Parchment Scroll again to dismount. This will not consume a scroll.
If you die or log out while being sat on the camel, you will automatically dismount.

name: Mysterious Pendant
description: A mysterious pendant that was found at the spot where the Mysterious Traveller disappeared.

name: Valaket Egg
description: none

name: Flame Giant's Heart
description: none

name: Large Heat Resistance Potion
description:
A Large Heat Resistance Potion created by the Fire Alchemist.
It has the same effect as Strong Ice Flower Oil.
Effect lasts for two hours.
[Effects]
All attack and defence powers increase by 5%
Protects from the heat of the Burning Sword.

name: Heat Resistance Potion
description:
A heat resistance potion created by the Fire Alchemist.
It has the same effect as Ice Flower Oil.

name: Ice Flower Oil
description:
A special oil extracted from the ice flowers in Glacernon.
Effect lasts for 10 minutes.
With regular use the effects of the Ice Flower Oil last for a maximum of two hours.
[Effects]
All attack and defence powers increase by 5%
Protects from the heat of the Burning Sword.

name: Heat Resistance Potion
description:
A heat resistance potion created by the Fire Alchemist.
It has the same effect as Ice Flower Oil.
Effect lasts for 10 minutes.
With regular use the effects of the Heat Resistance Potion last for a maximum of two hours.
[Effects]
All attack and defence powers increase by 5%
Protects from the heat of the Burning Sword.

name: Partner Skill Ticket (Single)
description:
Resets one of your partner's skills.
Agility increases to 100% and the skill becomes available again.
[Instructions]
Double-click on this item and select the skill that you would like to reset.
[Note]
If the skill is level S, it cannot be used.

name: Partner Skill Ticket (All)
description:
Resets all of your partner's skills.
Agility increases to 100% and one of the skills becomes available again.
For further skills your partner will need full agility again.
[Instructions]
Double-click on this item and then choose a skill by left-clicking.
[Note]
If a skill is level S, you can use this item but it is possible that you won't have an S skill afterwards.

name: Arena of Talents Ticket
description:
This is the ticket for the Arena of Talents.
Rise to the challenge and become the hero of NosTale!
[Note]
The item will be consumed when clicked upon.
The number of entries will be temporarily increased by one.
The increased number will later be reset again.

name: Arena of Masters Ticket
description:
This is the ticket for the Arena of Masters.
Only very brave heroes can enjoy this privilege!
If your number of entries is too low,
use the ticket and receive 1 additional entry.
[Note]
The number of entries is reset every month.

name: Recovery Potion (TA)
description:
The Recovery Potion for the Team Arena
immediately restores HP and MP by +5,000 each.
[Note]
The potion can only be used in the Team Arena.
[Limit]
3 potions

name: Attack Potion (TA)
effects: Self >> There is a 100% chance of causing [ Team arena attack power is increased.].
description:
The Attack Potion increases attack power by 15% for one minute.
[Note]
The potion can only be used in the Team Arena.
[Limit]
10 potions

name: Defence Potion (TA)
effects: Self >> There is a 100% chance of causing [ Team arena defence power is increased.].
description:
The Defence Potion increases defence power by 15% for one minute.
[Note]
The potion can only be used in the Team Arena.
[Limit]
10 potions

name: Energy Potion (TA)
effects: Self >> There is a 100% chance of causing [ Team arena energy is increased.].
description:
The Energy Potion increases HP and MP by 15% each for one minute.
[Note]
The potion can only be used in the Team Arena.
[Limit]
10 potions

name: Speed Potion (TA)
effects: Self >> There is a 100% chance of causing [ Team arena movement speed is increased.].
description:
The Speed Potion increases speed by +2 for one minute.
[Note]
The potion can only be used in the Team Arena.
[Limit]
10 potions

name: Unveiling Potion (TA)
effects: Self >> There is a 100% chance of causing [ Sharp Vision].
description:
The Unveiling Potion makes players trying to hide visible for 10 seconds.
[Bonus Effect]
Slightly increases the hit chance of all attacks.
Concentration is increased slightly for magic attacks.
[Note]
The potion can only be used in the Team Arena.
[Limit]
4 potions

name: Golden Arena Chest
description:
You will receive one of these items from the Golden Arena Chest:
[Items]
1x Small Ruby of Completion
1x Small Sapphire of Completion
1x Small Obsidian of Completion
1x Small Topaz of Completion
1x Ruby of Completion
1x Sapphire of Completion
50x Huge Recovery Potion
2x Shining Blue Soul
1x Dragon Heart
1x Lightning Rune
1x Wave Rune
1x Cloud Rune
1x Wind Rune
1x Fire Rune

name: Erenia's Blessing
effects: Self >> There is a 100% chance of causing [ Erenia's Blessing].
description:
Erenia's Blessing removes all negative effects.
Also provides a 50% chance to be resistant to
all negative effects for 4 seconds.
[Note]
Can only be used in the Team Arena.
[Limit]
1

name: Zenas' Blessing
effects: Self >> There is a 100% chance of causing [ Zenas' Blessing].
description:
With Zenas' Blessing you may not be able to move or attack for a short time,
but you have a 100% chance to block all damage for 3 seconds.
[Note]
Can only be used in the Team Arena.
[Limit]
1

name: Astral Energy
effects: Self >> There is a 100% chance of causing [ Astral Energy].
description:
When you use Astral Energy, your MP is restored by +5,000 for 10 seconds.
[Note]
Can only be used in the Team Arena.
[Limit]
1

name: Camouflage Cap
effects: Self >> There is a 100% chance of causing [ Camouflage Cap].
description:
With the Camouflage Cap you become invisible and
your speed is increased by +5 for 2 seconds.
For the following 8 seconds,
your speed will be reduced by -8.
[Note]
Can only be used in the Team Arena.
[Limit]
1

name: Revenge
effects: Self >> There is a 100% chance of causing [ Revenge].
description:
When you use Revenge, your speed is increased by +8 for 3 seconds.
[Note]
Can only be used in the Team Arena.
[Limit]
1

name: Acorn
description: The bushis' most prized item.

name: Bronze Acorn
description:
An acorn made from bronze.
I have no idea where the bushis got it from.

name: Silver Acorn
description:
An acorn made from silver.
I have no idea where the bushis got it from.

name: Golden Acorn
description:
An acorn made from gold.
I have no idea where the bushis got it from.
Very suspicious...

name: Wolf in Sheep's Clothing Gift Box
description:
Reward for defeating all monsters in the Sheep Farm Raid.
I have no idea what could be inside. It looks very suspicious.

name: Summon Pegasus
description: Summons the monster on the enemy's side.

name: Summon Kangpen
description: Summons the monster on the enemy's side.

name: Summon Grumbly Chicky
description: Summons the monster on the enemy's side.

name: Summon Yeti
description: Summons the monster on the enemy's side.

name: Summon Rudi
description: Summons the monster on the enemy's side.

name: Bushi King Gift Box
description:
A present from the Bushi King.
I have no idea what could be inside. It looks beautiful though.

name: Caligor's Treasure Chest
description:
A treasure chest belonging to Caligor the Golden Titan.
Gives you the chance to pick up numerous items.

name: Caligor's Spirit
description:
The spirit of Caligor the Golden Titan.
Nothing, absolute nothing is known about it.

name: Caligor's Glowing Treasure Chest
description:
A glowing treasure chest belonging to Caligor the Golden Titan.
Gives you a chance to pick up better items than from Caligor's Regular Treasure Chest.

name: Caligor's Regular Treasure Chest
description:
A simple treasure chest belonging to Caligor the Golden Titan.
Gives you a chance to pick up some good items.

name: Foxy's Raid Seal
description:
You can enter the Halloween Raid via Horrorholme in NosVille.
Recommended level: 20-99
Recommended players: 10+
[Instructions]
Use to become the team leader.
Once you are the leader, click other characters
and click the 'Team' button. When ready, head to the raid entrance.
When the leader enters the raid,
all other members will follow automatically.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Foxy's Wonder Chest
description:
There are lots of event items hidden in Foxy's Wonder Chest. Open it to collect them.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Fresh Liver
description:
Mr Park's First Son is craving for these.
Collect 5 Livers and bring them to him.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Blue Flask
effects: Self >> There is a 100% chance that [ Foxy's Charms] will be removed.
description:
One of Foxy's favourite items.
Removes movement slowing effects.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Yellow Flask
description:
One of Foxy's favourite items.
Restores 100% of your HP.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Red Flask
effects: Attack >> There is a 100% chance of causing [ Red Flask].
description:
One of Foxy's favourite items.
Inflicts fire element damage on your opponent for a certain time.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Halloween Wonder Chest
description:
There are lots of event items hidden in the Halloween Wonder Chest. Open it to collect them.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Giant Rice Cake
description:
Immediately restores 3,000 HP and MP.
Also applies to your NosMate.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Maru's Raid Seal
description:
You can enter the raid via the Snow Trail in NosVille.
Recommended level: 20-99
Recommended players: 10+
[Instructions]
Use to become the team leader.
Once you are the leader, click other characters
and click the 'Team' button. When ready, head to the raid entrance.
When the leader enters the raid,
all other members will follow automatically.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Maru's Tiger Chest
description:
There are many items in Maru's Tiger Chest which can be collected by opening it.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Sesame Oil
effects: Attack >> There is a 100% chance of causing [ Sesame Oil].
description:
Useful item in duels against Maru the Millennial Tiger.
Reduces the opponent's hit chance by 30% for 10 seconds.
[Note]
Can only be used at the siblings' house.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Wanderer's Chest
description:
This chest contains various handy items.
You will receive one of the following items:
1x Mysterious Hair Dye
1x Tarot Card Game
1x Ancelloan's Blessing
1x Large Special Potion
1x Sealed Vessel
1x Cylloan Spring Water
1x Wings of Friendship
1x Speaker
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Red Bean Rice Cake
description:
Useful item in duels against the Millennial Tiger.
Removes the tiger's [Tiger Power] effect.
[Note]
Can only be used at the siblings' house.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Brass Coin
description:
A valuable coin made of brass, ideal for trading.
Swap it for a Wanderer's Chest.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Witch Laurena's Raid Seal
description:
Starts the raid against Witch Laurena.
Recommended level: 70-99
Recommended players: 20+ to max. 40
[Instructions]
Use to become the team leader.
Once you are the leader, click other characters
and click the 'Team' button. When ready, head to the raid entrance.
When the leader enters the raid,
all other members will follow automatically.

name: Red Bean Soup
effects: Attack >> There is a 60% chance of causing [ Blackout].
description:
Imp raid item.
Imps absolutely detest this kind of food.
Stuns the target for 5 seconds.
[Note]
Can only be used in Nolbu's house.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Hongbi-Cheongbi Raid Seal
description:
You can start the raid against Hongbi and Cheongbi with this raid seal.
Recommended level: 20-99
Recommended players: 10+
[Instructions]
Use to become the team leader.
Once you are the leader, click other characters
and click the 'Team' button. When ready, head to the raid entrance.
When the leader enters the raid,
all other members will follow automatically.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Hungbu's Seed Grain
description:
The seed which Hungbu was given by the swallow.
[Instructions]
You can plant the seed in your Miniland.
[Note]
The monster which appears will disappear when you log out.
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Nolbu's Seed Grain
description:
The seed which Nolbu was given by the swallow.
[Instructions]
You can plant the seed in your Miniland.
[Note]
The monster which appears will disappear when you log out.
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Imp Raid Box
description:
This raid box contains various useful items.
Pick one up.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Laurena's Gemstone
description:
This gemstone belongs to Witch Laurena.
Looks very precious indeed.
Can be traded in with Sarakael.

name: Cleansing Powder
description:
Sarakael used Soul Slivers to develop this powder.
Removes [Morose Mood].
[Note]
The effect lasts until the end of the raid.
Only usable in the raid against Witch Laurena.

name: Laurena's Ancient Witch's Chest
description: Various valuable items are waiting inside Laurena's Ancient Witch's Chest.

name: Soul Sliver
description: Sarakael uses these to create Cleansing Powder.

name: Seed of Damnation
description: Sarakael uses these to create Witch Laurena's Raid Seal.

name: Laurena's Mysterious Witch's Chest
description: Various valuable items are waiting inside Laurena's Ancient Witch's Chest.

name: Laurena's Fabled Witch's Chest
description:
Various valuable items are waiting in Laurena's Witch's Chest.
It looks like there are even better items inside this one.

name: Lola Lopears' Raid Seal
description:
You can enter the summer event raid in Bunny's Backyard in NosVille.
Recommended level: 20-99
Players: 5-8
Recommended players: 6+
[Instructions]
Use to become the team leader.
Once you are the leader, click other characters
and click the 'Team' button. When ready, head to the raid entrance.
When the leader enters the raid,
all other members will follow automatically.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Dragon King's Raid Box
description:
Rediscovered raid box from the Dragon King.
You will receive of many different items.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Tortoise Present
description:
A present for the daily quest.
You will receive one of many different items.
[Note]
This item disappears at the end of the event.

name: Reward Box: Popularity Rankings
description: This is the reward box for the popularity rankings.

name: Reward Box: Reputation Rankings
description: This is the reward box for the reputation rankings.

name: Reward Box: Score Rankings
description: A reward box for the score rankings.

name: Ancelloan Essence
description: Allows the use of Ancelloan's Apparition.

name: Magic Bone Drake
description:
Ride the Magic Bone Drake with this item.
Increases your movement speed.
Use this item again to dismount.
There is no level requirement.
[Attributes]
Speed: 21
Speed in NosVille and Port Alveus +1
Speed in the desert and the Region of the Burning Sword +2
[With Speed Booster]
Teleports you to a random point on the map.

name: Magic Bone Drake Chest
description:
This box contains the Magic Bone Drake.
[Note]
The box is no longer tradeable once you release the Magic Bone Drake.

name: Ancient Slade Tower Raid Seal
description:
Create the raid for the Ancient Slade Tower with this raid seal.
Recommended level: 70-99
[Usage]
Use to become the team leader.
Once you are the leader, click other characters
and click the 'Team' button. When ready, head to the raid entrance.
When the leader enters the raid,
all other members will follow automatically.

name: Amulet of Attack Level (Limited)
effects: Self >> Attack level is increased by 1.
description: none

name: Amulet of Defence Level (Limited)
effects: Self >> Defence level is increased by 1.
description: none

name: Amulet of Attack and Defence Levels (Limited)
effects: Self >> Attack level is increased by 1.Self >> Defence level is increased by 1.
description: none

name: Solaris (Limited)
description: Possesses 30% light element power, but this cannot be increased.

name: Sellaim (Limited)
description:
Fire Fairy

The longer you have this fairy by your side in combat, the stronger her elemental attack power becomes.
(against monsters +/-15 levels)
This is added to your character's elemental power.
The fairy can increase your elemental power by up to 70%.
No experience is gained for defeating NosVille monsters.

effects: Self >> All elemental resistance is increased by 1.Self >> All element energies are increased by 10.

name: Big Ear Hairband (Limited)

Fire Fairy

This fairy carries the concentrated power of fire within her.
The longer you have her by your side in combat, the stronger her elemental attack power becomes.
(against monsters +/-15 levels)
This is added to your character's elemental power.
The fairy can increase your elemental power by up to 80%.
No experience is gained for defeating NosVille monsters.

name: NosMerchant Medal (30 Days) (Limited)
description:
When you use it, the following effects will last for 30 days.
[Listing Effect]
1. Listing fees are dropped.
2. You can list up to 100 items at the same time.
3. Sale price limit: 1,000,000,000 gold.
4. Offer period of up to 30 days.
[Effect on Goods Offered During Period]
1. Storage after sale: 30 days.
2. Sale fees are dropped.
[Important Note]
The number of items listed includes offered items, items that have not been collected from the NosBazaar, and any listings that have expired.

Once you take the Magic Jaguar out of the box, you can no longer trade it.

name: Adventurer's Knapsack (Permanent) (Limited)
description:
If you use the backpack, you can make use of the maximum
space for the categories equipment, Main and Others, permanently.

name: Partner's Backpack (Permanent) (Limited)
description: With your partner you can permanently take advantage of 50 extra inventory slots.

name: Pet Basket (Permanent) (Limited)
description:
With your NosMate's help you can permanently open your warehouse any time, any place.
If your pet is dead, you cannot use this item.
You also require a warehouse in your Miniland.

name: Novice Mount Scroll (Limited)
description:
Use this item to board a random mount (Magic Scooter, Magic Carpet, Magic White Tiger, Magical Skis, Magical Snowboard or the 'Billy Boneshaker' Bike).
Use this item again to dismount.
[Attributes]
Movement speed: 17
[With Speed Booster]
Speed +2
Duration +3
[Note]
Level limit: below 70
This item is not tradeable.

name: Divine Recovery Potion (Limited)
description: Restores 100% of you and your NosMate's HP and MP on use.

name: Release Scroll (Limited)
description:

Double-click the scroll and select the item
to release it.

name: Full Moon Crystal (Limited)
description: Used in Miniland.

name: Zephyr Wings (Limited)
description:
Transforms your specialist's wings into Zephyr Wings.
[Instructions]
1. Transform into a specialist.
2. Use this item to change your wings.
[Effect]
Provides a certain chance of firing a magical arrow when you use magic or ranged attack skills.
Movement speed +1
[Note]
1. You can only change the wings into Zephyr Wings with an improved Specialist Card +1 or higher.
2. The effect disappears when you put your Specialist Card in a card holder.

description: This amulet returns you to the village. Your current location is saved, and by using the Amulet of Return, you can return to this location again afterwards.

description:

and enter your message.

name: Speech Bubble (Limited)
description:
You can use the Speech Bubble for 30 minutes.
The bubble disappears when leaving the game.
Once entered the message cannot be altered.
Removing the bubble prematurely is not possible.

name: Special Pet Food (Limited)
description:
Feed your pet with this food
to have them automatically collect
fallen items. All items collected
will land in your inventory.
This option can only be
activated on NosMates accompanying you.
Placing your pet in a bead
will cancel this option.

one level. Requirement: the partner cannot

name: Mysterious Hair Dye (Limited)
description:
This hair dye is truly mysterious.
It changes your current hair colour to another random colour.
Try it out to find out what you get. Go on, we dare you!

name: Strange Partner Food (Limited)
description:
Put your partner on a special diet with this food.
If you give your partner some of this, their level will drop by one.
This is especially useful if your partner has a higher level than your character.
[Note]
Cannot be used on partners at level 1.

name: Savage Dyes (Limited)
description:
Use the Savage Dyes to pimp up the Faux Hawk Undercut and Choppy Bangs hairstyles.
[Note]
Can only be used once for one hairstyle.
Cannot be applied to other hairstyles.
Hairstyle cannot be dyed again afterwards.

name: Jelly Rolls Hair Wax (Limited)
description:
Changes the look of your hair to a Jelly Rolls hairstyle.
[Note]
Cannot be used by adventurers.
Only for male characters.

name: Faux Hawk Undercut Hair Wax (Limited)
description:
Changes the look of your hair to a Faux Hawk Undercut hairstyle.
[Note]
Cannot be used by adventurers.
Only for male characters.

name: French Braid Hair Wax (Limited)
description:
Changes the look of your hair to a French Braid ponytail.
[Note]
Cannot be used by adventurers.
Only for female characters.

name: Choppy Bangs Hair Wax (Limited)
description:
Changes the look of your hair to Choppy Bangs.
[Note]
Cannot be used by adventurers.
Only for female characters.

name: Cuarry Bank Debit Card (Limited)
description:
What's in your wallet?
This card allows you to use the Cuarry Bank from (almost) anywhere.
[Note]
Cannot be used in certain zones.
Disappears after one use.
